title: Installing Red Hat Virtualization as a standalone Manager with local databases
subtitle: Installing the Red Hat Virtualization Manager and its databases on the same server

abstract.para: This document describes how to install a standalone Manager environment – where the Red Hat Virtualization Manager is installed on either a physical server or a virtual machine hosted in another environment – with the Manager database and the Data Warehouse service and database installed on the same machine as the Manager. If this is not the configuration you want to use, see the other Installation Options in the Product Guide.
